name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy
name_original: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy
description:
Play the renowned survival and open-world classics with the original S.T.A.L.K.E.R. trilogy, now available on consoles for the first time.

Control legendary stalkers and investigate the origins of the Zone, forging paths that can lead to different outcomes according to your actions and decisions.

Test your mettle by exploring radioactive debris and anomalies and put your reflexes to the test in intense, tactical shootouts.

Search for the answers to the darkest mysteries that could cost you your sanity in sinister catacombs full of hungry mutants.

Travel through vast locations filled with Eastern European atmosphere and reminiscent of the real-life Chornobyl Exclusion Zone: the city of Prypiat, the Nuclear Power Plant, the Jupiter plant and many others.

Face the loneliness and desolation of these lands, the only company you'll have on your journey through this dark sci-fi setting.
